title: In the Shadow of the Mountains
description: Sarah Reynolds thought she knew just how her life would go, marriage, children and family. That all changed the day she was brutally raped and left pregnant. After five years the scars she carries are not just physical. Can she open her heart to a man who kills for a living?Tom Clayton’s father was murdered when he was only fifteen years old. He made it his life’s work to see justice done and the innocent avenged. However, there is a price to pay for that kind of life, and it’s your humanity. Can he find it again in the arms of a woman, a woman as wounded as Sarah?
author: Amberly Evans
